data.title: Berlin Lake near Berlin Center OH
data.meta_description: Monitoring location 03090000 is associated with a Lake, Reservoir, Impoundment in Portage County, Ohio. Current conditions of Lake or reservoir water surface elevation above NAVD 1988 are available. Water data back to 2016 are available online.
data.text:
Monitoring location 03090000 is associated with a Lake, Reservoir, Impoundment in Portage County, Ohio. Current conditions of Lake or reservoir water surface elevation above NAVD 1988 are available. Water data back to 2016 are available online.
